alert.note: Alert for Elbert; Franklin; Hart; Stephens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 17 at 5:38PM EDT until June 17 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 385 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 7 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST GEORGIA ELBERT FRANKLIN HART STEPHENS IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 10 COUNTIES IN PIEDMONT NORTH CAROLINA CABARRUS CATAWBA CLEVELAND DAVIE GASTON IREDELL LINCOLN MECKLENBURG ROWAN UNION NC IN SOUTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 12 COUNTIES IN UPSTATE SOUTH CAROLINA ABBEVILLE ANDERSON CHEROKEE CHESTER GREENVILLE GREENWOOD LAURENS OCONEE PICKENS SPARTANBURG UNION SC YORK THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABBEVILLE, ADVANCE, ANDERSON, BEREA, BLACKSTOCK, BOYDVILLE, CALHOUN FALLS, CANON, CATAWBA, CHARLOTTE, CHESTER, CLEMSON, CLINTON, CONCORD, CORNWELL, CROUSE, DACUSVILLE, EASLEY, ELBERTON, FARMINGTON, FORK CHURCH, FORK SHOALS, FORTSONIA, FRANKLIN SPRINGS, GAFFNEY, GASTONIA, GREAT FALLS, GREENVILLE, GREER, GUMLOG, HARTWELL, HICKORY, HUNTERSVILLE, INDIAN TRAIL, KANNAPOLIS, KINGS MOUNTAIN, LAURENS, LAVONIA, LINCOLNTON, MATTHEWS, MAULDIN, MIDDLETON, MOCKSVILLE, MONARCH MILLS, MONROE, MOORESVILLE, MOUNTAIN REST, NEWTON, NINETY SIX, NUBERG, OAKWAY, REED CREEK, ROCK HILL, ROYSTON, RUCKERSVILLE, SALISBURY, SENECA, SHELBY, SIMPSONVILLE, SPARTANBURG, ST. STEPHENS, STATESVILLE, TAYLORS, TOCCOA, TRINITY, UNION, WALHALLA, WARE SHOALS, WEDDINGTON, AND WESTMINSTER.
